message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to discuss the product with you. I think it's a great opportunity for you to get your hands on this amazing product. I'm willing to offer it to you for $12000. What do you think?
I'm very interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $8000. I'm willing to pay that price for it.
Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand your budget constraints, but I'm not willing to go as low as $8000. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $10500. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'd be willing to pay $9000 for the product.

I understand your concerns, Bob. I'm willing to be flexible, but I need to make sure I get a good return on my investment. I'm willing to offer it to you for $10000, which is my minimum price. If you're willing to meet me at this price, I'm willing to consider it. What do you think?
I appreciate your flexibility, Alice. I'm willing to meet you at $9500. I think that's a fair price for both of us.

I understand you're trying to find a middle ground, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway again. I'll offer it to you for $9750. This is my final counteroffer. If you're willing to meet me at this price, I'll consider it a done deal. What do you think?

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway again, Alice. I'm still a bit hesitant at $9750. I'm willing to meet you at $9500, but I'm not sure if I can go any higher. Can you consider this price?

I understand your concerns, Bob. I've been willing to meet you halfway multiple times, but I'm not willing to go any lower than $9750. I'm willing to give you one more chance to meet me at this price. If you're willing to meet me here, I'll consider it a done deal. What do you think?
